column4: can anybody recommend a software that is as good as photoshop, illustrator, fireworks and dreamweaver for ubuntu? i'm thinking of trying out ubuntu. :)
nothing in Ubuntu is that good.  You can try getting Photoshop to run under wine, but for those apps you're truthdully better off in Windows.  I dual-boot to do my Photoshop stuff
cool, i can adapt to new interfaces. just don't wana use wine. if i'm goin to use wine, might as well run windows... :)
you a webdesigner?  'cause if not, you'll probably find you'll be fine only dual-booting once in a blue-moon
